body.name: Lulive 10 Drawer Dresser, Chest of Drawers for Bedroom with Side Pockets and Hooks, PU Storage Dresser, Sturdy Steel Frame, Wood Top, Organizer Unit for Living Room, Hallway, Closet (White)
features: 10 Drawer Dresser & Ample Storage Space: The fabric dresser for bedroom is designed with 10 separate collapsible drawers including 3 different sizes to satisfy your classified storage needs, which provides you endless organizational possibilities. Also, the wood top provides a hard surface fit to place commonly used items, keeping them in your reach.

Upgraded Design & Side Pockets & Hooks: Compared with others’ closet dressers, our dresser combined 4 side pockets and 2 side hooks designs. The side pockets add extra space for thin items, hooks are handy for an umbrella, shopping bag, or other small-item organization.

Get Rid of Clutter: Lulive drawer dresser is a good helper for you to keep tidy and organized. It is a perfect complement to any contemporary decor, suitable to use in the bedroom, entryway, hallway, closet or living room, it works perfectly with your other storage furniture.

High Quality & Stable Structure: This tower chest of drawers is made of a sturdy steel frame, MDF wooden waterproof countertop, high-grade non-woven breathable fabric, and PU material, which offers reliable strength and stability, Meanwhile, the back bars upgraded the structural stability again!

Easy to Assemble & Friendly Customer Service: The package comes with understandable assembly instructions and numbered parts, you will get a new dresser in a short time. If you have any questions about our 10-drawer dresser, please feel free to contact us, your satisfaction is our first priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, Sturdy, and Reasonably Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: I don't know what most people expect from this general category of furniture. My expectations are:moderately attractive,very sturdy,and not too difficult to assemble.This dresser hits all three.Let's face it, it isn't nice wood furniture. But then it doesn't have that price point either. The collapsible fabric drawers have fronts that are solid with handles and are nice looking. The two horizontal surfaces are about what you might expect -- solid, smooth, clean.It is sturdy. This is improved by the addition of cross braces on the back to keep the piece from racking. Not all furniture in this category has this structural feature.Assembly took me a while but I'm "advanced in years" and it was a bit difficult for me to get down on the floor at times. Still, I managed to put the frame together in under an hour. A friend put the handles on the drawers for me while I did the frame.The end result is a not too heavy, very sturdy, clean and attractive piece of storage furniture that I hope to have in the house for years to come. The only thing I might have wanted to add is casters...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice For Storage
reviews.reviewText: Arrived very well packaged. Easy to put together, the drawer handles took the most time to put on. Tje drawers are cloth, but thr fronts look like wood. The screws for the handles looked a little flimsy, I would not use just to be safe. Using for storage, it holds a lot of items, even heavier items. Looks neat in the room.Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My daughter’s happy
reviews.reviewText: Got this dresser for my daughter. I thought the drawers would be solid and not the fabric type drawers but that is ok. Still works for my daughter. The dresser is light weight. Just feel it’s not as sturdy as I would like it to be. Once my granddaughters baby is born and is a toddler crawling around will definitely have to screw it safely to wall which it came with tools to do so. Otherwise I like the look at least and decent size. My daughter has more space now in her room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & Good For The Price
reviews.reviewText: I like that these are light weight yet sturdy. Great for the price. Easy to assemble. A few screws came messed up but they were extra luckily. The shelves on the side aren’t metal or plastic they are fabric that’s the only thing I didn’t think of behind hand. It works great and Amazon carries so many furniture items to match the designs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very satisfied with purchase
reviews.reviewText: I ordered another one of these from a different brand, it did not last the build!!!! This item was easy to assemble and well made. All the pieces fit nicely and did not crack while putting together. I would recommend this brand over others. Looks fantastic with my king size bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Build
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put together and the fabric drawers are pretty good quality. It’s pretty lightweight too, so it’s easy to move around once it’s together. There’s a lot of space in the drawers and fits a lot clothes/towels

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality product
reviews.reviewText: I love it😍. Easy assembly with clear instructions. Lots of storage space. It’s just tall enough that my 2 yr old wouldn’t reach their tv or anything that is put on top off it. It even comes with a little kit to screw the dresser into the wall for child safety. Which is a big plus because I have a climber. Would most definitely purchase again and for my room as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Got on my nerves
reviews.reviewText: First, the item was late getting here and had been delayed SEVERAL times. Then, after I received it, the directions were confusing saying to use different parts that were not all labeled. Assembling the piece was beyond frustrating. It also is much smaller than I thought. There IS a smell that does smell weird, but the overall piece looks professional.
Es perfecto y práctico. Facil de instalar y color muy bonito.
